rows.label: bf04250100_0010
rows.name:
...I see. It seems it would be best for all of us
if we worked together for the moment.

rows.label: bf04250100_0020
rows.name: Us work with you?

rows.label: bf04250100_0030
rows.name:
Yes, we want to capture that Artificial Blade
and uncover the identity of those behind it.

rows.label: bf04250100_0040
rows.name:
And from what you just told me, those I seek
likely have Tora's father held captive.

rows.label: bf04250100_0050
rows.name: Would you not say our interests align?

rows.label: bf04250100_0060
rows.name: Uh...I guess so?

rows.label: bf04250100_0070
rows.name:
Rather than clumsily opposing them,
it's more advantageous to accept their offer.

rows.label: bf04250100_0080
rows.name:
We shouldn't take the power of Kagutsuchi,
Jewel of the Empire, too lightly.

rows.label: bf04250100_0090
rows.name:
If she went all out on me, even I wouldn't be able to
hold back. Then...we'd burn this place to the ground.

rows.label: bf04250100_0100
rows.name:
I am honored that the Holy Grail herself
thinks so highly of me.

rows.label: bf04250100_0110
rows.name:
You may not remember it, but...
I've faced you a few times before.

rows.label: bf04250100_0120
rows.name: Let's just say it wasn't easy.

rows.label: bf04250100_0130
rows.name: Oh, really?

rows.label: bf04250100_0140
rows.name:
But that's a story for another time.
What do you say, guys?

rows.label: bf04250100_0150
rows.name:
I can't deny I'd rather avoid
making an enemy of them.

rows.label: bf04250100_0160
rows.name:
All right, then.
So, from this moment on I suppose we're allies!

rows.label: bf04250100_0170
rows.name:
For the moment, I will return to the palace.
If you learn anything new, please send word.

rows.label: bf04250100_0180
rows.name:
I will instruct the palace guards
to allow you audience with me.

rows.label: bf04250100_0190
rows.name: All right.

rows.label: bf04250100_0200
rows.name:
Are you sure you wish to partner
yourself with these people?

rows.label: bf04250100_0210
rows.name:
Just as you were not using your full strength,
neither still were they.

rows.label: bf04250100_0220
rows.name:
Yet you saw the power they demonstrated.
How could I not feel intrigued?

rows.label: bf04250100_0230
rows.name: Drawn by your Driver instincts?

rows.label: bf04250100_0240
rows.name: Something like that. And besides...

rows.label: bf04250100_0250
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...?

rows.label: bf04250100_0260
rows.name:
I get the feeling that, if I stay near that boy, I might
bear witness to something quite extraordinary.
